articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Australia captain Paine self-isolating

articles.content:

articles.author: Special Correspondent
articles.title: Coronavirus | Delhi overtakes Maharashtra as 95 fatalities are reported in 24 hours
articles.description: The Capital along with Maharashtra, West Bengal, Punjab, Kerala, Karnataka, Uttar Pradesh and Odisha make up for 79 % of the new deaths across the country.
articles.content:
About a fifth (21.84%) of new COVID-19 fatalities in the past 24 hours has been reported from Delhi (95 deaths), overtaking Maharashtra. 
Delhi also has recorded the second largest surge in new case… [+1673 chars]

articles.title: Australia races to contain Adelaide virus outbreak
articles.description: A sudden coronavirus cluster has emerged in the Australian city of Adelaide after seven months without a significant outbreak there, with the virus again escaping from the country's hotel quarantine system.

articles.author: CBS News
articles.title: Up to 50 million Americans could travel for Thanksgiving amid rising coronavirus cases, AAA says
articles.description: The soaring number of COVID-19 cases is not stopping people traveling for the upcoming Thanksgiving holiday. Kris Van Cleave reports.

articles.author: Manon Dark
articles.title: Nigel Farage warns Boris Johnson to 'get Brexit done' after PM goes into self-isolation
articles.description: NIGEL FARAGE has urged Boris Johnson not to quarantine if he tests negative for the coronavirus after the Prime Minister met an MP who is now COVID-19 positive.
articles.content: NIGEL FARAGE has urged Boris Johnson not to quarantine if he tests negative for the coronavirus after the Prime Minister met an MP who is now COVID-19 positive.

articles.title: Doctor reacts to Rand Paul telling Covid-19 survivors to throw away masks - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN medical analyst Dr. Jonathan Reiner reacts to Sen. Rand Paul (R-KY) telling coronavirus survivors to throw out their masks and celebrate.

articles.author: Wynne Davis
articles.title: U.S. Hits 11 Million Coronavirus Cases, Adding 1 Million In A Week
articles.description: More than 11 million confirmed coronavirus cases have been recorded in the U.S., according Johns Hopkins University. The country recorded 166,555 new cases in the last day and 1,266 new deaths.
articles.content:
The U.S. marked another grim milestone as the country reached 11 million confirmed COVID-19 cases less than a week after it hit 10 million.
Spencer Platt/Getty Images
